name: Commemorative Tokens by Artist Daniel Leighton

metadata.name: Permission To Enter Show Commemorative Token with Augmented Reality
metadata.description: This is the commemorative edition of Daniel Leighton's "Permission To Enter" show image. This piece features Augmented Reality (AR) via Daniel's free app "Daniel Leighton Art + AR" (Download here: https://www.danielleighton.com/app -- More info here: https://www.danielleighton.com/ar)
